dialogs.text: You saved me from that nasty dark woaf minion.
Thank you for savingme.
dialogs.rewardText: I will now need you help adventurer!

dialogs.text: My son recently got kidnapped by a new servant of dark woaf.... The Salatonion's.
Please save my son...
dialogs.altText: We need to go on the Dark Woaf's Lair.

dialogs.text: Thank you for reuniting me with my son!
We must put an end to the dictatorship of the Dark Woaf.
Will you help me destroy it?
dialogs.altText: Let's go on the Dark Woaf's Lair.

dialogs.text: This was a beautiful adventure Void, thank you for that...
I never wanted to make all of that but you know, if we want a balanced world, we must act...
So, now you are here, come fight to end all of that.
Argh....
Come fight you coward.
You opened my heart and destroyed the corruption of the dark woaf in me ... Thank you.
Oh bob... I'm so sorry, I regret so much..
You woke up, it's really cool!
You must be numb, you should try to move!
dialogs.altText: You are not sense to learn that, there is a problem...
dialogs.rewardText: Well, you look in better shape.

dialogs.text: We are going to start a fight initiation.
You will have to fight against a small battle droid. Are you ready?
dialogs.rewardText: Well done, you have the basics!

dialogs.text: Your initiation to fight is now complete, all you have to do is embark on an adventure...
A great villain by the name of Dark Woaf tries to reign in this world, it is in the name of all the inhabitants of the universe that you must defeat him.
I heard he started wreaking havoc on the planet of bobs, start there.
dialogs.altText: I wait for you here, go help Bob.
dialogs.rewardText: Thank you, you saved the planet bob from the grip of Dark Woaf

dialogs.text: You finished to save Bob from Dark Woaf
Let's train
Well played, you beat me ! Go talk to the AI for more information.
You've seen it all, so I'm going to have to delete you...
Arghhhh you beat me... I'm just a minion after all...
Do you want to return in the space ship ?
We killed Dark Woaf..
Is this the end?
Yes. It's now over for him.
We will never hear from him again.
Please save my son...
dialogs.altText: We need to go on the Dark Woaf's Lair.
dialogs.rewardText: Don't worry for that, the most important thing is that you have become yourself again and my son. Thank you for that Void !

dialogs.text: Now, we must put an end to the dictatorship of the Dark Woaf
Will you help me destroy it?
dialogs.altText: Let's go on the Dark Woaf's Lair.

dialogs.text: This was a beautiful adventure Void, thank you for that...
